Articles.Content:
Hey Guys,

Been playing KSP since 0.2ish and still loving it. Only until now have I had an issue with the RCS part in the VAB. After selecting it and moving it to the main build window it appears to be 100% on and makes it difficult to place in the VAB. If I go to launch then it's off but in the VAB it's active.

Any Help?

Cheers

Nick
I'm pretty sure an addon causes this, maybe tweakscale or mechjeb.
